verses.verse: In the third <S%H7992><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gone <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> the same <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> came <S%H935><s%> they into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

For they were departed <S%H5265><s%> from Rephidim, <S%H7508><s%> and were come <S%H935><s%> to the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and had pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> camped <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to God, <S%H430><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to him out of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall you say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and tell <S%H5046><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

You have seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I did <S%H6213><s%> to the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and how I bore <S%H5375><s%> you on <S%H5921><s%> eagles' <S%H5404><s%> wings, <S%H3671><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> you to myself.

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, if <S%H518><s%> you will obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> indeed, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> then you shall be a peculiar <S%H5459><s%> treasure to me above all <S%H3605><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is mine:

And you shall be to me a kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of priests, <S%H3548><s%> and an holy <S%H6918><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and laid <S%H7760><s%> before their faces <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> we will do. <S%H6213><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> See, <S%H2009><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> to you in a thick <S%H5645><s%> cloud, <S%H6051><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> may hear <S%H8085><s%> when I speak <S%H1696><s%> with you, and believe <S%H539><s%> you for ever. <S%H5769><s%> And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them to day <S%H3117><s%> and to morrow, <S%H4279><s%> and let them wash <S%H3526><s%> their clothes, <S%H8071><s%>

And be ready <S%H3559><s%> against the third <S%H7992><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> for the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> on mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

And you shall set bounds <S%H1379><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves, that you go <S%H5927><s%> not up into the mount, <S%H2022><s%> or touch <S%H5060><s%> the border <S%H7097><s%> of it: whoever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> shall be surely put to death: <S%H4191><s%>

There shall not an hand <S%H3027><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> it, but he shall surely <S%H3588><s%> be stoned, <S%H5619><s%> or shot <S%H3384><s%> through; whether <S%H518><s%> it be beast <S%H929><s%> or <S%H176><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> it shall not live: <S%H2421><s%> when the trumpet <S%H3104><s%> sounds long, <S%H4900><s%> they shall come <S%H5927><s%> up to the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> and they washed <S%H3526><s%> their clothes. <S%H8071><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> Be ready <S%H3559><s%> against the third <S%H7969><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> come <S%H5066><s%> not at <S%H413><s%> your wives. <S%H802><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> that there were thunders <S%H6963><s%> and lightning, <S%H1300><s%> and a thick <S%H3515><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> on the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> exceeding <S%H3966><s%> loud; <S%H2389><s%> so that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that was in the camp <S%H4264><s%> trembled. <S%H2729><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of the camp <S%H4264><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> with God; <S%H430><s%> and they stood <S%H3320><s%> at the nether <S%H8482><s%> part of the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> was altogether <S%H3605><s%> on a smoke, <S%H6225><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> descended <S%H3381><s%> on it in fire: <S%H784><s%> and the smoke <S%H6227><s%> thereof ascended <S%H5927><s%> as the smoke <S%H6227><s%> of a furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> quaked <S%H2729><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

And when <S%H1961><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> sounded <S%H1980><s%> long, and waxed louder <S%H3966><s%> and louder, <S%H3966><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him by a voice. <S%H6963><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> on mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount: <S%H2022><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> up to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount; <S%H2022><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> charge <S%H5749><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they break <S%H2040><s%> through to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to gaze, <S%H7200><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> of them perish. <S%H5307><s%>

And let the priests <S%H3548><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> which come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> sanctify <S%H6942><s%> themselves, lest <S%H6435><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> break <S%H6555><s%> forth on them.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> come <S%H5927><s%> up to mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai: <S%H5514><s%> for you charged <S%H5749><s%> us, saying, <S%H559><s%> Set bounds <S%H1379><s%> about <S%H854><s%> the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Away, <S%H3212><s%> get <S%H3381><s%> you down, <S%H3381><s%> and you shall come <S%H5927><s%> up, you, and Aaron <S%H175><s%> with you: but let not the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> break <S%H2040><s%> through to come <S%H5927><s%> up to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> he break <S%H6555><s%> forth on them.
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to them.
